prompts: Create a majestic dragon-type Pokemon with shimmering white scales and elegant wings.
I want a legendary Pokemon that embodies the power of ice and fire in its design.
Generate a mythical creature that looks like a flying dragon with brilliant blue accents.
Make a unique Pokemon that has a long, flowing tail and a fierce yet noble expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that dwells in high altitudes and is known for its striking appearance.
Design a powerful dragon Pokemon with a sleek body and ethereal features.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that brings balance to fire and ice elements.
